QueryViewSpec.Name: Sponsorship NTD Change Query
QueryViewSpec.Description: Used to determine which sponsorships have changed after a batch commit
QueryViewSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

ViewImplementation.ViewSQL:
with afterbatchcommit as ( select CONSTITUENT.LOOKUPID as SPONSORLOOKUPID, CONSTITUENT.NAME as SPONSORNAME, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.LOOKUPID as CHILDLOOKUPID, SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD.NAME as CHILDNAME, SPONSORSHIP.ID SPONSORSHIPID, REVENUESCHEDULE.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE, REVENUESCHEDULE.DATECHANGED, CHANGEDBY.USERNAME as CHANGEDBY_USERNAME
from dbo.REVENUE join dbo.REVENUESCHEDULE on REVENUESCHEDULE.ID = REVENUE.ID join dbo.REVENUESPLIT rs on REVENUE.ID = rs.REVENUEID join dbo.SPONSORSHIP on SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID = rs.ID join dbo.CONSTITUENT on CONSTITUENT.ID = SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID = SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD on SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD.ID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID left join dbo.CHANGEAGENT CHANGEDBY on CHANGEDBY.ID = REVENUESCHEDULE.CHANGEDBYID
where SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1)
select b.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE as BEFORENTD, a.NEXTTRANSACTIONDATE as AFTERNTD, a.SPONSORLOOKUPID, a.SPONSORNAME, a.CHILDLOOKUPID, a.CHILDNAME, a.SPONSORSHIPID as ID, a.DATECHANGED, a.CHANGEDBY_USERNAME from USR_TEMP_NTDBEFOREBATCHCOMMIT b join afterbatchcommit a on b.SPONSORSHIPID = a.SPONSORSHIPID
